references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with CLIP latents
references.reason: This paper builds upon the previous work by introducing a hierarchical approach that improves the fidelity and controllability of text-to-image generation.

references.paper_title: Taming transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This work demonstrates a significant advancement in high-resolution image generation using transformers, which is crucial for the quality of the results in the current paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a significant improvement in high-resolution image synthesis, a key aspect of the image generation technology used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper presents a significant advancement in the photorealism and quality of text-to-image generation, directly influencing the quality and capability of the target models used in the current paper.
